page.title: 06HOUSING
page.content: The area's housing consists of {farmhouses and cottages.}The cottages, some of them derelict or unoccupied, are built with{granite and sandstone walls. The roofs of the cottages are made from{slate tiles.}They have no upstairs windows apart from skylights} and the downstairs sash windows are {wooden framed.}The gutters and drainpipes are made from iron. Some of the cottages that have been modernised have extensions and outside walls which have been{harled.}These extensions to the cottages are built outwards from the back door. They have {flat, felt covered roofs.}The walls are built from{concrete}blocks which have been harled afterwards. The basic materials used for cottages have also been used for the farmhouses but the farmhouses are much larger.
